name: Margherita® Sun-Dried Tomato and Salami Bruschetta
author: Margherita Meats
summary: Diced Margherita® Genoa salami, smoked Gouda cheese, chopped calamata olives and zesty seasoning make for a light yet satisfying appetizer.
ingredients: 2 ounces finely diced, thickly sliced deli Margherita® Genoa or Hard Salami*
¼ cup drained, finely chopped sun-dried tomatoes (packed in oil)
¼ cup finely diced smoked provolone or smoked Gouda cheese
2 tablespoons finely chopped pitted calamata olives
2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil or Italian parsley
directions: Cut bread crosswise into 1/2-inch thick slices; arrange on a baking sheet
Combine oil and garlic; spoon over bread slices
Bake about 15 minutes or until bread is lightly toasted
Meanwhile, combine salami, sun dried tomatoes, cheese, olives and basil; mix well and set aside
(If mixture seems dry, add 1 teaspoon oil from bottled sun dried tomatoes)
Just before serving, spoon salami mixture over toasts
